alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 6:38AM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts around 60 mph expected. Isolated gusts of 70 to 80 mph are possible near the foothills west of Clark. * WHERE...Cody Foothills especially just south of Cody to the Montana border. * WHEN...Now until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation, particularly along Wyoming Highway 120. Elevated to extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
info.instruction: Use caution if you drive, and keep both hands on the steering wheel in case of a sudden strong wind gust.
